definition: to keep/to contain/to suck (keep in your mouth without chewing)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes

sentences.english: Slug test is a new method to obtain aquifer parameters.
sentences.chinese: 重錘試驗是一種獲得含水層水文地質參數的新方法。

sentences.english: The accuracy and precision of measurements from electrical meter were analyzed by statistical technique.
sentences.chinese: 以統計方法分析所量得含水率數值之準確性與精密性。

sentences.english: The serum MBP and moisture in brain tissues were observed as index.
sentences.chinese: 以血清MBP和腦組織含水量作爲觀察指標。

sentences.english: The percentage of soil moisture content and surface residual coverage jointly influence the quantity of wind erosion.
sentences.chinese: 土壤含水率和地表殘茬覆蓋共同影響着土壤的風蝕量。

sentences.english: But in the sandy land, the change tendency of the soil moisture content is opposite to the clay land.
sentences.chinese: 而在沙土地，土壤含水量的變化趨勢與黏土地相反。

sentences.english: The microbial degradation of BHC was remarkably influenced by the soluble oxygen in flooded soil.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲含水量影響了微生物呼吸活性所致。

sentences.english: This is because the water content of fresh day lily have Colchicine can cause poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲鮮黃花菜中含水量有秋水仙鹼，會引起中毒。

sentences.english: The subducted slabs was metamorphosed to water-bearing eclogite before being melted.
sentences.chinese: 該俯衝板片熔融前通常變質爲含水的榴輝巖。

sentences.english: Temperate rain forests get much of their water from moisture-laden ocean winds.
sentences.chinese: 溫帶雨林得到很多的它們的雨水從含水分的海洋風。

sentences.english: Sometime the term artesian is used to denote a confined aquifer .
sentences.chinese: 有時候人們也用自流含水層這一術語表示承壓含水層。

sentences.english: Sometime the term artesian is used to denote a confined aquifer .
sentences.chinese: 有時候人們也用自流含水層這一術語表示承壓含水層。

sentences.english: The best conditions for the weeds germination were saturation soil moisture to thin layer water.
sentences.chinese: 土壤含水量飽和至薄水層最有利於萌發。

sentences.english: The water potential of embryo was positively correlated with its moisture content.
sentences.chinese: 番茄種胚水勢與含水量的關係呈冪指數的正相關。

sentences.english: The results indicate that water-bearing super heavy oil shows features of pseudoplasticity fluid.
sentences.chinese: 結果表明，含水超稠油的流變模式呈假塑性流體特徵。

sentences.english: The desert air contains hardly any moisture.
sentences.chinese: 沙漠裏的空氣幾乎不含水分。

sentences.english: Proper water content is able to decrease the haze of the film.
sentences.chinese: 適當的含水率可以減小薄膜的霧度。
